705343f-a.text:
Lafayette Ave., south side, east from South Portland Ave. At the left, is the Lafayette Presbyterian Church, undergoing repairs.
April 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
705343f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Portland Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705344f-b.text:
91 Lafayette Avenue, at the N. E. corner of South Portland Avenue, showing the only remaining house of a row of old brownstone houses. The others were replaced by a new apartment house.
View 1: October 10, 1940
View 2: September 19, 1941
P. L. Sperr
705344f-b.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Portland Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
